channel.title: ramble on Shermans's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in ramble on Shermans's Notes

item.title: The Only Thing I Ever Wanted To Make
item.description: Yesterday I turned 28. For the last 13 years at least I have been very interested in computers and programming in general. I now could not imagine what I would be doing now if it were not for these devices that live in almost every aspect of my life. Still I haven’t really done much with that, as far as I am concerned. I have made no great websites, services, products, or games.
